      • Gety

        public int Gety()
        this is the getter for the worldy value
        Returns:
        returns the WorldY value

      • AddEntity

        public void AddEntity(java.lang.String name,
                      int Energy)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This function takes 2 parameters and creates AnEntity based upon what the string is. The string then determines which child class is created and is subsequently added into the Entity Arraylist. Once the entity is added the number of entities n the world is increased.
        Parameters:
        name - This is the speicies name that is being passed into the function
        Energy - This is the energy value passed into the function
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • Search

        public int Search(java.lang.String species,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        This is the generic search function used to search for the target entity. If there is AnEntity at the specified location and is of the correct type then returns the value in arraylist target entity is at
        Parameters:
        species - This is the species type
        x - this is the x value of the target entity
        y - this is the y value of the target entity
        Returns:
        if target entity type is at specified location return position in the arraylist, else return -1

      • isSpaceFree

        public boolean isSpaceFree(int ex,
                           int ey)
        This function checks to see whether there is an Entity at the taget location (x,y)
        Parameters:
        ex - target x value
        ey - target y value
        Returns:
        false is there is an entity in the space, if not return true

      • GetEntityAt

        public int GetEntityAt(int x,
                       int y)
        This function takes x and y, searches through world to find an entity at the position x, y. If there is an entity at that position in the world then the position in the entity array will be returned. If not returns -1
        Parameters:
        x - this is the target x value
        y - this is the target y value
        Returns:
        returns -1 if nothing found, returns the index of the found entity in the array

      • Simulate

        public void Simulate()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function simulates the world. It calls the update function for each entity (AnEntity), then there is a random chance of a new food entity spawning in a random position. The thread then sleeps to allow a slow framrate within the stage.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • Stats

        public void Stats()
        This function counts how many of each type of Entity there are in the array and such in the world. Displays the total on screen for user to view.

      • ShowEntitys

        public void ShowEntitys(GUI GUI)
        This function loops through the entity arraylist and then calls the display entity function
        Parameters:
        GUI -
